description: Follow a huge weekend of Welsh rugby action across BBC Wales Sport including Scotland v Wales in the Six Nations on Sunday.
title: Wales women, U20s and Pro12 TV coverage
title_page: Wales women, U20s and Pro12 TV coverage - BBC Sport
maintext:
The Wales national team are not the only side in rugby action this weekend as they take on Scotland in the Six Nations at Murrayfield on Sunday.
On Friday, 13 February, Wales Under-20s aim to follow up last weekend's win against England against Scotland U20s, with Ospreys also in action away to Edinburgh in the Pro12.
Saturday sees Wales women aim to make it two wins from two as they take on their Scottish counterparts.
Highlights of the match can be seen on Scrum V on Sunday.
Follow it all across BBC Wales Sport.
